page.title: 08My House Karin. Age 11
page.content:
KITCHEN In the kitchen you will find, A cooker to cook things, A kettle to boil with, A freezer to freeze things, And a fridge to keep things cool. We haven't got a microwave, But we've got an electric can opener. Last but not least We've also got our washing machine In the kitchen.
MY BEDROOM Now we've come to my bedroom, And what a shock you'll get If you have a look in. I have got a keyboard That runs on electricity. I have also got a ghetto blaster, Or if you want its technical name A portable stereo radio cassette recorder.
